Title: Erratum to: Bi-directional cell-pericellular matrix interactions direct stem cell fate (Nature Communications, (2018), 9, 1, (4049), 10.1038/s41467-018-06183-4)
Abstract: © 2018, The Author(s).In the original version of this Article the dataset identifier in the Data Availability statement was incorrect. The correct dataset identifier is PXD009500. This has been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of this Article.
